name: Larie Jane Rubi
title: UI/UX Designer
bio: A fourth year student at University of Cebu-Main motivated UI/UX Design Intern proficient in Figma and prototyping, dedicated to designing intuitive interfaces and improving user experiences through thoughtful design decisions.
about: transforming complex problems into simple, beautiful, and intuitive designs.

projects.title: Virtual Wellness
projects.description: VirtualWellness is a web-based appointment system designed to simplify online healthcare consultations by allowing patients to easily book appointments, receive notifications, and connect with doctors in a streamlined and user-friendly platform.

projects.title: UClean 360
projects.description: UClean360 is an IoT-based smart waste management system designed to improve waste collection efficiency within a university campus. Smart sensors embedded inside trash bins monitor waste levels and automatically trigger alerts when bins are full or nearing capacity.

projects.title: LaundryLink
projects.description: LaundryLink is a kiosk-based laundry ordering system designed to streamline and automate the laundry service process. Through an interactive touch-screen interface, customers can easily enter their contact details, choose their preferred laundry services, and place their orders.

projects.title: LensLend
projects.description: LensLend is a mobile application designed to simplify the process of renting cameras and photography gear. The app allows users to explore available equipment, view detailed specifications, check availability, and make reservations directly from their mobile devices.

projects.title: Sit-in Monitoring System
projects.description: The Sit-In Monitoring System is a web-based platform designed to manage and monitor student sit-in sessions within university laboratories. Students can request or schedule sit-in appointments for specific labs based on their subject or academic needs, ensuring proper lab usage and scheduling.

projects.title: Mi Casa de Leo
projects.description: Mi Casa de Leo is a web-based homeowner management system designed to improve communication and convenience within a residential community

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Information Technology
education.description: Focused on digital design, user experience, and visual communication.
